name_original: Shark Attacks! FREE: Hungry Fish Revenge Laser Shooting Racing Game - By Dead Cool Apps
description:
••••• "Like Shooting Fish in a Barrel" - With a Laser Gun! •••••

--> Nearly 100,000 Downloads & Counting! <--

NOW BATTLE YOUR FRIENDS WITH MULTIPLAYER!

You're RoboShark a genetically engineered Shark with a Laser Gun strapped to his back. He's escaped from the lab and is hell bent on destruction, are you game?

So easy to control. Swim RoboShark with one finger - fire his Laser Gun with another. Hold down for rapid Laser blasting action. Let's shoot some sea life...

• WARNING: HIGHLY ADDICTIVE! •

• NEW Multiplayer - Play with friends!
• Gorgeous retina graphics
• Exciting endless gameplay
• Fast and frantic shooter

• UNLOCK MORE CHARACTERS •

You'll collect lost treasure to unlock RoboShark's friends:

• Electro Puffer Fish - Devastating electric shock teleport attack. Swims super fast.
• Killer Whale - Slower swimmer but has an awesome sonar attack.
• NEW: Dark Shark - Double laser blasting action.

Make sure you download Shark Attacks! now while it's 100% FREE.
